verses.verse: Let brotherly <WG5360> love <WG5360> continue. <WG3306>
Be not forgetful <WG1950> to entertain <WG5381> strangers: <WG5381> for thereby <WG1223> <WG5026> some <WG5100> have entertained <WG3579> angels <WG32> unawares. <WG2990>

Remember <WG3403> them that are in bonds, <WG1198> as bound <WG4887> with them; and them which suffer <WG2558> adversity, <WG2558> as being <WG5607> yourselves <WG846> also <WG2532> in the body. <WG4983>
Marriage <WG1062> is honorable <WG5093> in all, <WG3956> and the bed <WG2845> undefiled: <WG283> but fornicators <WG4205> and adulterers <WG3432> God <WG2316> will judge. <WG2919>

Let your <WG3588> conversation <WG5158> be without <WG866> covetousness; <WG866> and be content <WG714> with such <WG3588> things as you have: <WG3918> for he has said, <WG2046> I will never <WG3364> leave <WG447> you, nor <WG3761> <WG3364> forsake <WG1459> you.
So <WG5620> that we may boldly <WG2292> say, <WG3004> The Lord <WG2962> is my helper, <WG998> and I will not fear <WG5399> what <WG5101> man <WG444> shall do to me.

Remember <WG3421> them which have <WG3918> the rule <WG2233> over you, who <WG3748> have <WG3918> spoken <WG2980> to you the word <WG3056> of God: <WG2316> whose <WG3739> faith <WG4102> follow, <WG3401> considering <WG333> the end <WG1545> of their conversation. <WG391>
Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> the same <WG846> yesterday, <WG5504> and to day, <WG4594> and for ever. <WG165>

Be not carried <WG4064> about <WG4064> with divers <WG4164> and strange <WG3581> doctrines. <WG1322> For it is a good <WG2570> thing that the heart <WG2588> be established <WG950> with grace; <WG5485> not with meats, <WG1033> which <WG3739> have <WG3918> not profited <WG5623> them that have <WG3918> been occupied <WG4043> therein <WG1722> <WG3639>.
We have <WG2192> an altar, <WG2379> whereof <WG1537> <WG3739> they have <WG2192> no <WG3756> right <WG1849> to eat <WG5315> which serve <WG3000> the tabernacle. <WG4633>

For the bodies <WG4983> of those <WG5130> beasts, <WG2226> whose <WG3739> blood <WG129> is brought <WG1533> into <WG1519> the sanctuary <WG39> by the high <WG749> priest <WG749> for sin, <WG266> are burned <WG2618> without <WG1854> the camp. <WG3925>
Why <WG1352> Jesus <WG2424> also, <WG2532> that he might sanctify <WG37> the people <WG2992> with his own <WG2398> blood, <WG129> suffered <WG3958> without <WG1854> the gate. <WG4439>
Let us go <WG1831> forth <WG1831> therefore <WG5106> to him without <WG1854> the camp, <WG3925> bearing <WG5342> his reproach. <WG3680>
For here <WG5602> have <WG2192> we no <WG3756> continuing <WG3306> city, <WG4172> but we seek <WG1934> one to come. <WG3195>

By him therefore <WG3767> let us offer <WG399> the sacrifice <WG2378> of praise <WG133> to God <WG2316> continually, <WG1275> that is, the fruit <WG2590> of our lips <WG5491> giving thanks <WG3670> to his name. <WG3686>
But to do <WG2140> good <WG2140> and to communicate <WG2842> forget <WG1950> not: for with such <WG5108> sacrifices <WG2378> God <WG2316> is well <WG2100> pleased. <WG2100>

Obey <WG3982> them that have the rule <WG2233> over you, and submit <WG5226> yourselves: <WG5216> for they watch <WG69> for your <WG5216> souls, <WG5590> as they that must give <WG591> account, <WG3056> that they may do <WG4160> it with joy, <WG5479> and not with grief: <WG4727> for that is unprofitable <WG255> for you.
Pray <WG4336> for us: for we trust <WG3982> we have <WG2192> a good <WG2570> conscience, <WG4893> in all <WG3956> things willing <WG2309> to live <WG390> honestly. <WG2573>
But I beseech <WG3870> you the rather <WG4056> to do <WG4160> this, <WG5124> that I may be restored <WG600> to you the sooner. <WG5032>

Now <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of peace, <WG1515> that brought <WG321> again <WG321> from the dead <WG3498> our Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> that great <WG3173> shepherd <WG4166> of the sheep, <WG4263> through <WG1722> the blood <WG129> of the everlasting <WG166> covenant, <WG1242>

Make <WG2675> you perfect <WG2675> in every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041> to do <WG4160> his will, <WG2307> working <WG4160> in you that which is well pleasing <WG2101> in his sight, <WG1799> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ; <WG5547> to whom <WG3739> be glory <WG1391> for ever <WG165> and ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>
And I beseech <WG3870> you, brothers, <WG80> suffer <WG430> the word <WG3056> of exhortation: <WG3874> for I have written <WG1989> a letter <WG1989> to you in few <WG1024> words.
Know <WG1097> you that our brother <WG80> Timothy <WG5095> is set <WG630> at <WG630> liberty; <WG630> with whom, <WG3739> if <WG1437> he come <WG2064> shortly, <WG5032> I will see <WG3700> you.
Salute <WG782> all <WG3956> them that have the rule <WG2233> over you, and all <WG3956> the saints. <WG40> They of Italy <WG2482> salute <WG782> you.
Grace <WG5485> be with you all. <WG3956> Amen. <WG281> Written to the Hebrews from Italy, by Timothy.
